text: Maurício Magalhães Prado (born 22 June 2001), commonly known as Maurício, is a Brazilian footballer who currently plays as a midfielder for Cruzeiro. ==Career== Maurício joined Cruzeiro on loan from Desportivo Brasil ahead of the 2019 season. In November 2019, Cruzeiro confirmed that they had signed Maurício for a fee around 800 thousand R$.Meia-atacante Maurício renova com Cruzeiro até 2023 e recebe convocação da seleção sub-20, globoesporte.globo.com, 12 November 2019 ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|State League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Continental !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |- |Cruzeiro |2019 |Série A |8||1||0||0||1||0||0||0||0||0||9||1 |- |Cruzeiro |2020 |Série B |9 |1 |11 |4 |4 |0 |0 |0 |0 |0 |24 |5 |- ! colspan="3" |Career total !17!!2!!9!!3!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!33!!6 |} ;Notes ==References== ==External links== * Category:2001 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Desportivo Brasil players Category:Cruzeiro Esporte Clube players Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série A players
